description: G.1 Silver Birch x2 - Reduce to previous points (approx 2.5m).T.2 Contorted Willow - Pollard at 8m from ground level (decayed main stem at base).T.3 Silver Birch - Crown Lift To 5m From Ground Level.T.4 Elder - Fell (Dead).G.5 Norway Maple & Poplar - Reduce crown of Maple to previous points (approx 2m) & fell failed poplar stem.T.6 Silver Birch - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
